DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine multiple dos canagliflozin ( JNJ-28431754 ) affect pharmacokinetics ( ie , body affect drug ) pharmacodynamics ( ie , drug affect body ) single dose glyburide .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effects Canagliflozin ( JNJ-28431754 ) Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics , Safety Glyburide Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label ( volunteer study staff know identity assign treatment ) , single-center , fixed-sequence study ( volunteer receive medication day ) determine canagliflozin ( drug currently investigate treatment type 2 diabetes mellitus ) affect pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics glyburide ( blood glucose-lowering agent use treat patient diabetes ) . The study consist 3 phase ; screen phase , open-label treatment phase , end-of-study ( follow-up ) phase . During open-label treatment phase , volunteer receive single 1.25 mg dose glyburide Day 1 , follow 200 mg canagliflozin daily Days 4 8 . On Day 9 volunteer receive glyburide 1.25 mg canagliflozin 200 mg. Each volunteer participate study approximately 40 day .
DOC.criteria: Volunteer must body mass index ( BMI = weight kg/height m2 ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) body weight less 50 kg Volunteer history currently active illness consider clinically significant Investigator illness Investigator considers exclude patient study could interfere interpretation study result Volunteer fast plasma glucose < 100 mg/dL ( measure oral glucose tolerance test ) 2hour plasma glucose < = 140 mg/dL History smoking use nicotinecontaining substance within previous 6 month
